name: SOLIDAR FOUNDATION
goal:
The SOLIDAR Foundation is the cooperation platform of SOLIDAR; a European network of NGOs working to advance social justice in Europe.

The SOLIDAR Foundation plays a crucial role in digesting the info from EU level and making it understandable for national stakeholders.
Also informing about ways and building the capacity to interact with the EU on a national level

SOLIDAR FOUNDATION engages through member and partner organizations citizens in EU decision making processes, empowers people through lifelong learning and VET, and voices their concerns to the EU institutions by actively promoting the best practice from national/regional level.

SOLIDAR Foundation identifies funding opportunities and channel funding to national, regional and local organisations to build their capacities and generate more impact.

SOLIDAR cooperates with progressive civil society and labour movement organizations, is an founding member of LLL-Platform, Civil Society Europe, and works in strategic partnerships with ETUI and ITC-ILO.
interests: Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Youth
